entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Grand Falls-Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:32 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.4°C

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15 except minus 20 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15 except minus 20 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3.
